lead_paragraph: Jason Day closed out Graeme McDowell, 3 and 2, at the World Golf Championships match-play event in Austin, Tex., and then sought treatment for a back problem.

headline.main: Jason Day and Jordan Spieth Win Matches

snippet: Jason Day closed out Graeme McDowell, 3 and 2, at the World Golf Championships match-play event in Austin, Tex., and then sought treatment for a back problem.
abstract: Results of first round of match play at World Golf Championships given.
